channel.title: If I made this into a .bat file what would it do?
channel.description: [code]@echo off :Repeat del C:\PROGRA~1\GAME_M~1\Uninstal.exe if exist C:\PROGRA~1\GAME_M~1\Uninstal.exe goto Repeat rmdir C:\PROGRA~1\GAME_M~1 del C:\Delme.bat [/code]

item.title: If I made this into a .bat file what would it do?
